Condition_summary_1: The Proponent must implement vegetation-enhanced stone revetment and catchbasin shields as offsetting measures by September 30, 2021, with monitoring for vegetation survival (80%) and turbidity reduction (50%).
Condition_summary_2: The Proponent must not carry out any activities that adversely impact the offsetting measures and must provide access permissions for DFO to monitor them.
Condition_summary_3: The authorization may be revoked or amended if necessary to protect species at risk, and compliance is mandatory to avoid legal consequences.
Condition_summary_4: The Proponent must submit annual monitoring reports for two years post-construction and ensure all offset measures meet effectiveness criteria.
Vegetation_Cover: Riparian vegetation (e.g. trees and shrubs and grass)
